class.name: IsisMocNarrowAngleSumming
class.brief: Converts between image and detector coordinates for MOC NA camera
class.description: This class is a convenience class used in camera models and radiometric calibration for converting MOC Narrow Angle camera image coordinates into detector coordinates. This is accomplished by applying the crosstrack summing mode and the first line sample (edit mode) in the conversion process.

argument.name: csum
argument.description: Cross track summing value, usually read from the labels of the cube

argument.name: ss
argument.description: First line sample value, usually read from the labels of the cube

function.name: Detector
function.description: Returns a detector position given a sample position in the cube by removing the summing mode and first line sample values

function.name: Sample
function.description: Returns a sample position given a detector position in the cube by applying the summing mode and first line sample values
